name: Acid Island
description: You are stranded on an island that feels off you feel the sea breeze and feel it the water its acidic and you know that things are not going to end well if it turns night time you have to find a way off the island because there does not seem to be anyone else around that can help you as the island seems to be inhabited just not with human life you have to get out and quick,  You find a row boat but there a few planks missing before its able to use it,  You need to find them and get on the boat and to safety.  some of the assets are lagging the game so please be wary as to when you load the game up.
